NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to access your calendar
NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to use your camera
NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to access your contacts
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to use your location
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to access your microphone
NSMotionUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to access your device's accelerometer
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Give Gurucan permission to save photos
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Give Gurucan permission to access your photos
NSRemindersUsageDescription: Allow Gurucan to access your reminders
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Allow gurucan access to your location to improve experience
